articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: At long last, Solana support is finally live on OpenSea—in beta mode.
articles.title: Solana NFTs Can Now Be Traded on OpenSea

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Brett Harrison contrasted the exchange's strategy with Coinbase's.
articles.title: FTX US Holding Back on Token Listings Due to Regulatory Uncertainty: CEO

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Those issuing stablecoins will have to publicly disclose the assets that back them—be it cash reserves or something else.
articles.title: Pennsylvania Senator Pat Toomey Debuts TRUST Act for Regulating Stablecoins

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The Treasury secretary said the department thinks using crypto to evade sanctions on a large scale "is something that is not easy to do."
articles.title: Yellen: 'We Haven't Seen Significant Evasion' of Sanctions Using Crypto

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum were down 5% and 8%, respectively. Other coins were hit harder.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Drop on Interest Rate Fears as Crypto Market Loses $130 Billion

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Terra founder Do Kwon has said he wants to grow that sum to $10 billion.
articles.title: Terra Adds $230 Million to Push Bitcoin Reserve to $1.6 Billion

articles.author: Nicholas Mowbray
articles.description: The IRS is determined to raise more revenue from crypto owners and has equipped its agents with the tools to do that.
articles.title: The IRS's 'Operation Hidden Treasure': What it Means for Crypto Holders

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Ghost Recon Breakpoint won’t get any further content, but Ubisoft’s Tezos NFT initiative will expand to other games.
articles.title: Ubisoft Will Bring Tezos NFTs to Other Games as Ghost Recon Support Ends

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Changpeng Zhao, who heads crypto exchange Binance, has found his way into Forbes’ 20 richest billionaires list.
articles.title: Binance CEO CZ Vaults Into Forbes Top 20 Richest As $200M Forbes Deal Looms

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: A former employee stole 8.2 million names and account numbers from Cash App Invest customers in December, Block said in an SEC filing.
articles.title: Former Block Employee Stole Over 8 Million Names, Cash App Account Numbers

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The sports media giant will debut its first Tom Brady NFTs today, in partnership with the quarterback's own NFT startup.
articles.title: ESPN Enters NFTs With Tom Brady Drop on Polygon, Autograph Deal

articles.author: Adriana Hamacher
articles.description: True privacy protection will set people free and secure democracy, says the inventor of eCash and the quantum-resistant, privacy-preserving blockchain xx network.
articles.title: How David Chaum Went From Inventing Digital Cash to Pioneering Digital Privacy

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The DeFi market slowed down in Q1. It's a sign of the market maturing and consolidating, says a new DappRadar report.
articles.title: DeFi Market Cools in Q1 Amid Hacks as VCs Pour $2.5B Into Crypto Games

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Terraform Labs is partnering with LongHash Ventures in a bid to increase Web3 development on the Terra blockchain.
articles.title: Terraform Labs, LongHash Ventures Roll Out Terra Accelerator Program

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: This new raise was led by Tiger Global with participation from FTX Ventures, Dragonfly Capital, and others.
articles.title: Ethereum Rival NEAR Protocol Raises $350 Million in New Funding

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Secret NFT holders will gain access to "Killroy Was Here" and can help create sequel(s) with their NFTs, Smith tells Decrypt.
articles.title: Kevin Smith to Release New Horror Film via Secret Network NFTs, Collaborate With Holders

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Sky Mavis will use the money to audit and upgrade the security of the Ronin bridge and to refund victims of the $622 million hack.
articles.title: Sky Mavis Raises $150M in Binance-Led Funding for Ronin Bridge Refund

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Binance.US raised more than $200 million from Circle and others as its parent company seeks to establish legitimacy in the United States.
articles.title: Binance US Valued at $4.5B, Circle Among New Investors

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Bitcoin miner Marathon Digital Holdings announced plans to move its facility to a new location in search of more sustainable energy.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Marathon to Transition 'Away From Fossil Fuel Generation’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: As the broader crypto market turned red, several blue-chip DeFi tokens suffered significant losses over the past day.
articles.title: DeFi Tokens RUNE, SNX, AAVE Tumble as Crypto Market Dips

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The leading canine cryptocurrency Dogecoin has enjoyed a hefty rally as Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk makes big moves in the Twitterverse.
articles.title: Dogecoin Jumps 7% as Elon Musk Joins Twitter Board

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The Tesla CEO isn't known for being shy about DOGE and BTC on Twitter.
articles.title: Elon Musk's Dogecoin and Bitcoin Tweets: A Crypto Twitter Timeline

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: U.S. lawmakers are pressing on with legislation aimed at protecting U.S. financial interests from El Salvador’s Bitcoin Law.
articles.title: New Bill Takes Aim at El Salvador’s 'Careless Gamble' on Bitcoin

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Nearly 20% of Bitcoin’s hash rate is produced by public mining companies, up from just 3% in January 2021.
articles.title: Dominance of Public Bitcoin Miners Jumps Nearly Sixfold in 15 Months

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Oscar-winning director Steven Soderbergh is teaming up with Roman Coppola's Decentralized Pictures, a platform that uses crypto to fund films.
articles.title: 'Ocean's Eleven' Director Steven Soderbergh Gives $300,000 to Crypto-Powered Film Fund

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: While volume fell again last month, OpenSea daily trading volume is climbing and the market posted a sizable first quarter tally.
articles.title: NFT Market Rebounds After Weak March as Q1 Trading Tops $12 Billion

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Ledger founder and CEO Ian Rogers said that the more people understand hardware wallets, the more likely they are to become customers.
articles.title: Ledger Buys Land in The Sandbox as Part of Metaverse Push to Educate Crypto Newbies

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Over 96,000 BTC are moving off of exchanges every month, according to research from Glassnode.
articles.title: Bitcoin Held on Crypto Exchanges Reaches 'Multi-Year Lows': Report

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The Taro Protocol will bring stablecoin transfers to the Bitcoin Lightning Network.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Lightning Labs Raises $70 Million, Announces Taro Stablecoin Protocol

articles.author: Vivek
articles.description: Attorney and guest contributor Vivek Jayaram proposes fixes to the problem of counterfeit NFTs.
articles.title: A Sea of Fakes? Combating Counterfeit NFTs on OpenSea

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Strata has raised a seed round from Multicoin Capital, Alameda Research and others to offer a no-code launchpad to play-to-earn games and social token projects.
articles.title: Strata Raises $1.5M to Build a No-Code Token Launchpad on Solana

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Elon Musk has been appointed to Twitter's Board after it was announced yesterday that he had acquired a 9.2% stake in the social media firm.
articles.title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk Joins Twitter Board After Taking 9.2% Stake

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: An insider exploit of MailChimp's newsletter database has resulted in Trezor users being targeted in a malicious phishing scam.
articles.title: Mailchimp Insider Targets Trezor Crypto Wallets in Phishing Scam

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Hivemapper rewards users with tokens for passively capturing mapping data with dashcams in a model inspired by Helium.
articles.title: A Decentralized Google Maps? Solana-Based Hivemapper Raises $18M to Build It

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Jamie Dimon praised blockchain technology and DeFi, a stark contrast to his previous statements on crypto.
articles.title: ‘Decentralized Finance and Blockchain Are Real’: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: FTX.US partners with IEX to build a venue for trading digital asset securities. It's a shot across the bow for high-frequency traders.
articles.title: FTX.US Makes Strategic Investment in IEX Exchange

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Federal prosecutors in Miami have seized millions in crypto as part of a larger operation to crack down on drug and financial crimes.
articles.title: US Authorities Seize $34M in Crypto Linked to Illegal Dark Web Activity

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The “Connect the World” fund, which was announced yesterday, will put $20 million to work creating onramps into the Celo network.
articles.title: Celo Token Hits Three-Month High Amid Launch of $20M Incentive Fund

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: SEC Chair Gary Gensler asked staff to coordinate with the CFTC on ways to regulate crypto exchanges that feature both securities and non-securities.
articles.title: Gensler Wants SEC and CFTC to Regulate Crypto Exchanges Together

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: With OpenSea inbound, Magic Eden leans into its “Solana-native” status by enabling purchases with tokens from leading NFT projects.
articles.title: Magic Eden to Accept Tokens From Top Solana NFT Projects Aurory and DeGods

articles.description: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.
articles.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’

articles.description: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You

articles.description: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long

articles.description: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."
articles.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022

articles.description: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.
articles.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help

articles.description: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.
articles.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs

articles.description: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.
articles.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'

articles.description: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.
articles.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant

articles.description: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.
articles.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO

articles.description: Edward Snowden gives an extensive interview to Marta Belcher of Filecoin Foundation for Camp Ethereal 2022, taped on February 27. He talks about how governments view crypto as "an evolving threat," how crypto "transforms power relationships," why he thinks Ethereum "suffers from the same privacy problems as Bitcoin," and why he views central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as "crypto-fascist currencies."
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Governments and Crypto, CBDCs, and Ethereum vs Bitcoin at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis and Big Night Entertainment managing partner Tim Bonito tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their deal for a Boston nightclub residency and record collaboration with DJ duo ESCAPΞPLAN, and give their takes on Ethereum vs Solana for buying and trading NFTs.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis on Ethereum vs Solana for NFTs

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin what drew him to NFTs, and heaps a lot of praise on DJ 3LAU for pioneering in the space and prompting more artists to get in.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis: Why I'm Getting Into NFTs

articles.description: ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin talked about Ethereum 2.0 timing and impact, the power of DAOs, and gave his honest take on NFTs, Solana, Polygon, and Biden's crypto executive order in an extensive fireside chat with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: Joe Lubin Talks Ethereum 2.0, NFTs, and DAOs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried sits down for a conversation with one of his heroes, the moral philosopher and Princeton University professor Peter Singer, exclusively for Camp Ethereal 2022, powered by Decrypt. They talk animal rights, climate change, effective giving, Bitcoin's energy use, and how crypto is helping Ukraine.
articles.title: Crypto and Effective Altruism: Sam Bankman-Fried Interviews Peter Singer at Camp Ethereal
